name: Beta 0.3 TPS Game
description:
So This Is  The Continuation  Of Beta 0.2. So I  Had Some Change Of  Plans And Decided To Make The Game Third Person Shooter. So This Is Like Beta 0.1 Where You Could Just Move Around And Also Was A Test For Third Person Type. In This Beta Version

  • Added A New Map
  • Added A New Pause Menu
  • Added A New Main Menu
  • Added A Settings Option In Main Menu To Change Screen Resolution, Full screen Mode,  Graphics Presets.
  • Fixed A Bug Where You Exited To Main Menu From Pause Screen, The Cursor Was Not Appearing And Was Not Able To Use Main Menu.

In Beta 0.4, I Will Add

  • Parkour System For The Player

In Every Single Day, I Will Add 1 Or More Features So I Can Complete My Other Work On Time (Really Important Stuff) . So It Will Take Time To Reach Its Final Development.
